pr_title: Load Mainnet ProtocolSchedule Faster and With Less Memory Usage

timeline.message:
faster loading and no out of memory on normalizing keys

Signed-off-by: Ratan Rai Sur <ratan.r.sur@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: All of the uses are in test classes.  Can this be moved to one of our test util classes?  Along with getMainnetConfigOptions?  Either in an existing or new class in ethereum/core/src/test-support/java/org/hyperledger/besu/ethereum/core
timeline.author: shemnon

timeline.message:
move uses/classes
